itunes:title: Episode 1119 - Battle For The Senate
title: Episode 1119 - Battle For The Senate
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
description:
Senate races are heating up in battleground states like Georgia, Pennsylvania, Nevada, and Ohio -- plus Texas governor Greg Abbott loses a basketball game to a child, and Tom Brady says he's basically just like a soldier on deployment.
